amendment.description: Amendment increases the exception from SEC registration to 2,000 investors, provided that no more than 500 are not accredited investors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 112-409 to increase the total number of investors and limit the number of non-accredited investors allowed to be holders of record before registration is required.
